PHRASE.LANG: kName
Leotard with Socks to be Worn with Shoes (Red, Women)
Body et chaussettes à porter avec des chaussures (Rouge, Femme)
Gymnastikanzug und Socken, tragbar mit Schuhen (rot, für Frauen)
Body e calzini da abbinare alle scarpe (rosso, da donna)
Leotardo y calcetas para vestir con zapatos (Rojo, Mujer)

양말과 레오타드, 신발 덧신기용 (빨간색, 여성)
Leotard with Socks to be Worn with Shoes (Red, Women)

Leotard and Socks for Wearing with Shoes (Red, Female)
kDesc
A red leotard with white socks. Can be worn with shoes. [#Legal]
Body rouge et chaussettes blanches. Peut être porté avec des chaussures. [#Legal]
Roter Gymnastikanzug und weiße Socken. Schuhe können darüber angezogen werden.[#Legal]
Body rosso e calzini bianchi. Abbinabili con delle scarpe.[#Legal]
Leotardo rojo y calcetas blancas Los zapatos se pueden poner por encima.[#Legal]
赤いレオタードと白いソックス。上から靴を履ける。[#Legal]
빨간색 레오타드와 하얀 양말. 위에 신발을 신을 수 있다. [#Legal]
A red leotard with white socks. Can be worn with shoes. [#Legal]
紅色緊身衣和白色緊身襪。可加穿鞋子。[#Legal]
紅色緊身衣和白色緊身襪。可加穿鞋子。[#Legal]
A red leotard and white socks. Shoes can be worn on top.[#Legal]
